input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with MongoDB Synchronization

The investment optimization process has been hindered by synchronization issues with MongoDB 4.4, specifically after recent updates to Zoho CRM, which might be due to compatibility conflicts or data conversion errors You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. Attempts to reset connections and verify configurations have been unsuccessful My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. Assistance is needed to resolve this issue.
